situation: A cylindrical rum 2m in radius is held by a rigid bar AB hinged at A and a flexible wire cable BC as shown. The drum weighs 1500N and strut AB has a length of 10m. Neglect friction in all contact surfaces.

subquestions.question: Which of the following gives the normal reaction at D in Newtons.
Which of the following gives the vertical reaction at A in Newtons.
Which of the following gives the tension in cable BC in Newtons.
